attributes.action: Change current poilcies that allow monitoring of the nation's web and email usage, privacy is a basic human right.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are digusted that the goverment see fit to use anti terrorist laws and public order issues, to sneak in big brother tactics to affect the general public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
